definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: Hippos do not ruminate, which means that they do not chew their cud.
sentences.chinese: 河马不反刍，这意味着他们不咀嚼反刍。

sentences.english: Hippos do not ruminate, which means that they do not chew their cud.
sentences.chinese: 河马不反刍，这意味着他们不咀嚼反刍。

sentences.english: To provide ruminant animal an excellent herding ground with hay or sports field.
sentences.chinese: 提供反刍动物良好之牧草地或运动场。

sentences.english: Optimization of ruminal, digestion:a modeling approach.
sentences.chinese: 反刍动物，消化优化建模方法。

sentences.english: The slaughter procedure for small ruminants is similar to that of cattle.
sentences.chinese: 小反刍动物的屠宰过程与宰牛类似。

sentences.english: That was denuded by these ruminant pests.
sentences.chinese: 全被那些反刍的害人虫给毁了。

sentences.english: Bluetongue occurs in most species of ruminants, both domestic and wild.
sentences.chinese: 蓝舌病发生于大多数家生的和野生的反刍动物。

sentences.english: Food selection is one of the main research contents in nutritional ecology of ruminants.
sentences.chinese: 食物选择是反刍动物营养生态学的重要研究内容之一。

sentences.english: The cow began to ruminate after eating up grass.
His measure of success is his students' capacity to regurgitate factual data.
sentences.chinese: 他的成功标准就是学生反刍事实数据的能力。

sentences.english: The third division of the stomach of a ruminant animal, located between the abomasum and the reticulum .
sentences.chinese: 重瓣胃反刍动物的第三胃，位于皱胃和网胃之间。

sentences.english: Lining of the stomach of a ruminant used as food.
sentences.chinese: 用作食物的反刍动物的胃的内层。

sentences.english: The mount and quality of the foraged plants can significantly influence the time spent ruminating .
sentences.chinese: 摄入牧草的数量和质量对家畜的反刍时间有重要影响。

definition: to forage/to gather for eating/to pick and eat
(of a bird) to peck at food
to feed (a child, domestic animal etc)/to keep/to raise (an animal)
